bug.author: hzy46
bug.summary: rest-server reports: fetch job status failed: podCompletionStatus.containers is not iterable
bug.description:
How to reproduce:
Setup a hived vc which has more cpu capacity than ground truth. For example, you have a node with 10 CPUs, but configure the hived as it has 20 CPUs. Submit a job to that vc, which takes all CPUs of the vc capacity.
Then try to access the submitted job: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7499023/77626450-56253f00-6f80-11ea-90bd-c2596cd8e924.png></denchmark-link>
It cannot be stopped: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7499023/77626508-6fc68680-6f80-11ea-9930-594d4524a01b.png></denchmark-link>
